item.title: John Leguizamo Slams Dean Cain as a “Loser” for Joining ICE: “What a Moron”
item.description: The former ‘Superman’ actor recently criticized James Gunn’s adaptation after he said “Superman is the story of America … an immigrant that came from other places and populated the country.”
